tool_description: Calculates comprehensive resource requirements including staff, materials, facilities, and budget estimates for program implementation.

program_activities.description: List of all planned program activities

service_frequency.description: How often services will be delivered: daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly

cost_region.description: Regional cost context: low, medium, high

error_messages: Invalid participant number: Target participants must be between 1 and 10000.
Invalid duration: Program duration must be between 1 and 60 months.
Invalid service frequency: Use one of [daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly].
Too many locations: Limit geographic locations to 10 or fewer.
Invalid cost parameters: Cost region must be [low, medium, high], indirect rate must be 0-50%.
usage: Input program activities, target participants, duration, service frequency, and locations. Optionally specify staff categories and cost parameters. Tool calculates comprehensive resource requirements and budget estimates.

staff_requirements.description: Required staff positions and time commitments

material_costs.description: Estimated costs for materials and supplies

cost_breakdown.description: Detailed breakdown of major cost categories
